name: Human heart
description: A vital organ that pumps blood throughout the body. Used for transplants or medical education. Requires blood type matching, cold storage, and legal clearance.

name: Human liver
description: A crucial organ for detoxification, metabolism, and digestion. Used in transplants or medical studies. Requires blood type matching, cold storage, and legal clearance.

name: Human kidney
description: Essential for filtering blood and producing urine. Used in transplants or medical research. Requires blood type matching, cold storage, and legal clearance.

name: Human lungs
description: Vital for respiration and oxygen exchange. Used in transplants or medical education. Requires blood type matching, cold storage, and legal clearance.

name: Human pancreas
description: Important for digestion and insulin production. Used in transplants or medical research. Requires blood type matching, cold storage, and legal clearance.
